name: pre-commit
description: Automatically install pre-commit hooks for your npm modules.

scripts.example-fail: echo "This is the example hook, I exit with 1" && exit 1
scripts.example-fail-200ms-delay: sleep .2 && echo "This is the example hook, I'm delayed 200ms and exit with 1" && exit 1
scripts.example-fail-500ms-delay: sleep .5 && echo "This is the example hook, I'm delayed 500ms and exit with 1" && exit 1
scripts.example-pass: echo "This is the example hook, I exit with 0" && exit 0
scripts.example-pass-200ms-delay: sleep .2 && echo "This is the example hook, I'm delayed 200ms and exit with 0" && exit 0
scripts.example-pass-500ms-delay: sleep .5 && echo "This is the example hook, I'm delayed 500ms and exit with 0" && exit 0

author: Arnout Kazemier <opensource@observe.it>
